subproject.description: This project will address climate change risks under the five APP Global Project outputs, focusing on strengthening: (1) adaptive long term planning capacities, including baseline meteorological and population vulnerability measurement (2) institutional and human resource capacities at all levels (3) policies and measures, with a focus on the already degraded area of northern São Tomé for pilot activities in developing community CCA strategies and improving livelihood resilience in priority sectors.(4)financing options for adaptation activities at local, national, sub-regional and regional (5) knowledge sharing on mainstreaming CCA activities documents in key sectors nationally and internationally.
subproject.title: AAP PIMS 4375 Full - STP
